plot: Life isn't easy for a boy made of peanut butter. Dangerous appliances... Garbage disposals... a hungry dog... But still Jip risks everything in his perilous journey across the kitchen to rescue a friend from being eaten.
title: Jip
plot_es: Life isn't easy for a boy made of peanut butter. Dangerous appliances... Garbage disposals... a hungry dog... But still Jip risks everything in his perilous journey across the kitchen to rescue a friend from being eaten.
plot_en: Life isn't easy for a boy made of peanut butter. Dangerous appliances... Garbage disposals... a hungry dog... But still Jip risks everything in his perilous journey across the kitchen to rescue a friend from being eaten.
